ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Failed to get host address from ServerCache
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Check out: http://crawler.archive.org/faq.html#windows.  Also, for sure you have connectivity to a working DNS server on the crawl box? St.Ack

libsoft wrote:
> Hi you gurus,
>
> I am new to Heritrix and met some errors. My box is Windows XP, 
> JDK1.4.2_11, Heritrix1.6.0. I can get heritrix run up but can not get 
> it crawl anything. When i start the job, there is nothing happened and 
> the local-errors.log is like the following.

Check out: http://crawler.archive.org/faq.html#windows.  Also, for sure 
you have connectivity to a working DNS server on the crawl box?

St.Ack

>
> local-errors.log
>
> 2006-04-22T12:00:46.015Z    -2          - http://www.pconline.com.cn/
